name: MicroKnights
description: This is just a small  2 player game I made in my spare time to test an idea. one player uses WASD to control the character and the other player uses the arrow keys. S or down arrow is attack, A and D or left arrow and right arrow are left and right. W and up arrow are jump and press again whilst in the air to double jump. Pick up power ups to gain an edge over your opponent. Any donations will go towards better software to make an improved version. I really hope you enjoy! :)
